issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

exists in 1.5.0.
found in 1.6.0 (01/03/11 08:14 11dd2b6), droid 1 (2.2.1)

1.Controls > text Field > the rest
2.tap enabled, then tap into the text field

resultds: field takes appearance of disabled text field, but keyboard invokes

3.enter text by way of software keyboard, then try on a device with a hard keyboard

results: physical keyboard not active, but soft keyboard allows text entry into a disabled text field.

{html}
fields.summary: Android: disabled text fields allow software keyboard text entry (not physical keyboard)

comments.body: Closing ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
